short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension tool to mute Chrome browser tabs.
short.fr: Outil d'extension pour mettre en sourdine les onglets du navigateur Chrome.
short.ja: Chromeブラウザのタブをミュートする拡張ツール。
short.ko: Chrome 브라우저 탭을 음소거하는 확장 도구.
short.ru: Расширение для отключения звука во вкладках браузера Chrome.
short.zh_CN: 用于静音Chrome浏览器Tab的扩展工具。
short.zh_TW: 用於靜音Chrome瀏覽器Tab的擴展工具。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Mute Tabs" is a browser extension designed for Google Chrome. This tool allows users to mute the audio of individual tabs or all open tabs in the browser. It provides a convenient way for users to control sound playback within their current active tab or across all tabs, enhancing the browsing experience.
